pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This is a lm_sensors modul for the following mainboards: Asus ROG Crosshair Hero VII (WiFi), BIOS 1002 or newer Asus ROG Crosshair Hero VII, BIOS 1002 or newer Asus ROG Crosshair Hero VI, BIOS 6301 or newer Asus ROG Crosshair Hero VI (WiFi), BIOS 6302 or newer ASUS Zenith Extreme, BIOS 1607/1701 or newer ASUS Zenith Extreme Alpha, ??? Prime X399-A, BIOS 1002 or newer Prime X470-Pro, BIOS 4602 or newer
The following boards are not tested yet: ASUS ROG STRIX B450/X470 (e.g. Strix B450-F) Prime B450-Plus ASUS ROG CROSSHAIR VI EXTREME
